channel.title: The Origin [Devolution Source] Bringing back RS
channel.description:
[center]Basically what I'm doing is remaking Runescape on a Devolution Source. Its not going to be "exactly" like it, [b]i'm making it to the best of my ability[/b][/center] [center]My Reason why I'm doing this is because "I hate servers that have 30 portals at the home or you get 126 combat in 1 hour and it's a good way for me to learn more about devolution sources."[/center] [center]Servers that take 1 day to max out are point less.. and we should start coding realistic servers. WITHOUT USING DELTA.[/center] [center][b]I know devolution wasn't the best souce to use, but I like devolution :).[/b][/center] [center]I don't have no fancy banners or anything like that. Im just coding to the best of my ability.[/center] [center]This is what I got so far.[/center]
[center]Lumbridge- Almost all npcs, just need to fix up npc attacking emotes and other stuff.[/center] [center]Varrock- Almost all npcs added, finished up Varrock sewers.[/center] [center]Falador- Haven't done much besides add a couple npcs.[/center] [center]Barbarian Village- Finished adding npcs.[/center] [center]Npcs- All npcs have drops and respawn times.[/center]
[center]Working Skills[/center] [center]All Combat (including magic/range)[/center] [center]Woodcutting[/center] [center]Firemaking[/center] [center]Fishing[center] [center]Smithing[/center] [center]Mining[center] [center]Fletching[/center] [center]Thieving[/center] [center]Cooking[/center] [center]Crafting[/center]
[center]Shops- Most of the shops are done, just need to fix up some of the items in them.[/center] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/25510l4.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/28kpjtf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/e5mosh.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/aeup1e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/n3vjm9.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/xfq9te.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2zrhvmx.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/5f17px.jpg[/img] [center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2j4zyc9.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Added working dummy.[/center] [center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/hvxq8l.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Problems I have[center] [center]Missing correct npc locations for some places.[/center] [center]Wild is messed up. Need to remove dueling.[/center] [center]Need to make it so npcs face you when you attack them.[/center] [center]Some other stuff, just cant think of them atm.[/center] [center]If you can help me with any of these let me know.[/center]
[center]Sorry for the lack of pictures, there's not much to show.[/center]
Starting Place- (Lumbridge) Almost done with the npcs. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/11bhxc1.jpg[/img]
Varrock- Doing some simple Npc Dialogue [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2eaud5t.jpg[/img]
Falador- Haven't done much yet. Working city to city. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/29kyo7c.jpg[/img]
[center][b]Il keep updating when I finish more.[/b][/center] [center]Before you comment, Im doing this to the best of [b]my[/b] ability. Im not saying this is going to be the best ever.[/center] [center]Thanks to Tabbykiller for the npc attack emote list :).[/center]

item.title: The Origin [Devolution Source] Bringing back RS
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

What’s wrong with delta?

And IMO, I went to moparscape to get away from RuneScape, so hopefully we don’t remake runescape tbh. Sorry.
EDIT: Although a 2004-2007 RS server would be nice.

Read full topic

Do you know how rare it is to find someone that doesnt use Delta on these forums?

@ontopic
Looks pretty good so far.

Missing correct npc locations for some places.

Kevin’s site has an NPC Coord dump somewhere, Ill see if I can find it for you.

item.title: The Origin [Devolution Source] Bringing back RS
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“faded vision, post:16, topic:286620”]This is not fucking bringing back rs, The changes you have made have made it look nothing like Runescape.

Well done idiot.[/quote]Well done idiot for being such a blind fucking asshole. So the same shops in here which are the same as RuneScape’s look nothing like the ones in RuneScape, and none of the npcs are even SIMILAR? You’re retarded and just looking for a place to rip on someone.

Don’t listen to him. It looks nice. But perhaps for the older look, go for an older gameframe and just a 317 deob?

Read full topic
